org.apache.jackrabbit.core.search.lucene
Class PathFilterQuery

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.lucene.search.Query
      org.apache.jackrabbit.core.search.lucene.PathFilterQuery
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Serializable
class PathFilterQuery
extends org.apache.lucene.search.Query

A PathFilterQuery is a wrapper around a native lucene query and adds a PackageFilter around that query.

Version:
$Revision: 1.3 $, $Date: 2004/01/23 15:55:40 $
